column4: Is there a way to install ubuntu over the net by booting off floppy disks?  If so, is there a document that details where to get the images or could someone point me where to get them from.
see here: https://wiki.ubuntu.com/LocalNetInstall     and especially the link at bottom (for boot floppies)
caveat: i don't know if this works
Thank you, I was wondering if I was going to get an answer
